name: empact
description: Environment and Maturity Program Assessment and Control Tool

scripts.install-all: yarn install && cd web && yarn install && cd .. && yarn sync-app && cd web_static && yarn install && cd ..
scripts.dev: ECHO 'Use 'yarn dev-web' to edit the frontend in browser or 'yarn dev-app' to run the tauri app in dev mode.'
scripts.dev-app: node warning_message.js && yarn sync-app && cd src-tauri && tauri dev
scripts.build-all: cd web && yarn build && cd .. && yarn sync-app && cd src-tauri && tauri build
scripts.build-web: cd web && yarn install && yarn build && cd ..
scripts.build-static: cd web_static && yarn install && yarn build && cd ..
